turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Kathy! Can you order me some pizza from Chicago's please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course I can, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: First I'm going to start with a large traditional crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That one is going to be pepperoni and jalapenos.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, and what else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second one will be a medium deep dish.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, and what toppings do you want on that one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The deep dish is ham and pineapple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any breadsticks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Definitely. I will get two orders.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what kind of sauce do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kinds do they have, again?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have mild cheese, a nacho cheese, a pizza or marinara sauce, and garlic butter.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'll get like four nacho cheeses, one pizza sauce, and one garlic butter.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, will that be all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have two pizzas, a large pepperoni and jalapeno, and a medium ham and pineapple, both deep dish. Two orders of breadsticks with 4 nacho cheese, one pizza sauce, and one garlic butter.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almost. I want the pepperoni and jalapeno on traditional crust. That's for my husband and he likes that kind better.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sorry about that. Okay, I'll make that one traditional. It says it'll be ready in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good deal, will I get the receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, they are going to send it to you through a text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome! Thanks!
